title: Peter Thomas Interview
itunes:title: Peter Thomas Interview
description:
Wednesday 5/17- Today on the show we had Peter Thomas from RHOA stop by to speak on the recent fight between him and Matt Jordan and the drama and this houghts about Phaedra and Porsha. Moreover, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Brandon Vezmar for being very petty to his date and Angela Yee gave some advice to some listeners for Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
